title: Eva Longoria Is Coming to CNN+ With Original Series ‘Searching for Mexico’
sub_head: Actress, director and producer will be featured in a CNN+ show that explores Mexican cuisine
body:
CNN said actress Eva Longoria is coming to its new streaming service with an original series that will follow her as she travels through Mexico and explores its cuisines.
The six-part series, “Eva Longoria: Searching for Mexico,” will debut exclusively on CNN+, a subscription service that is set to launch in the first quarter of 2022.
